Hi Guys,

First time post and unsure if this is the correct place to post.

I am wanting to know the math behind the current Aero Model for Kerbin. I tried the wiki [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Atmosphere](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Atmosphere) but seems to be out of date, or at least does not point directly to saying that what is described is for 1.02.

I'm trying to work out optimum conditions for launches and orbits.

IF anyone has any answers or ideas please help.

Thank you in advance.
